body.p: You can set a background of a page. Usually you do this for the cover page, to impose a full page artwork, or to add graphics to the header and footer of the page. Let see how can you do it for the page:

p.note: Is better to use SVG for the page artworks. It does not suffer from pixelation. If you are limited to use raster images, you can fine tune their resolution by using the image-resolution property.

body.p: If your artwork is smaller, consider a "DRAFT" watermark for instance, you should use the background-position to place it where you need:
